mapper.insert: insert into facility(facility_id , facility_name, open_time, close_time, default_time,basic_fee,rate_adjustment,hot_time,contact, info, caution, court,product, facility_status, facility_images) values(#{facility_id}, #{facility_name}, #{open_time}, #{close_time}, #{default_time}, #{basic_fee}, #{rate_adjustment}, #{hot_time},#{contact}, #{info}, #{caution}, #{court}, #{product}, #{facility_status}, #{facility_images})

INSERT INTO user_tbl (user_id, user_name, email, password, phone, address, birthday, join_date, login_date, user_status, level, qr_Code) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{user_name}, #{email}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{birthday}, #{join_date}, #{login_date}, #{user_status}, #{level}, #{qrCode})
insert into court(court_id, court_name, facility_id, court_status) values(#{court_id}, #{court_name}, #{facility_id}, #{court_status})
mapper.select: select * from facility f join court c on f.facility_id = c.facility_id
select * from reservation r join court c on r.court_id = c.court_id and c.facility_id = #{facility_id} and c.court_id = #{court_id};
select membership_level from membership where user_id = #{user_id}
SELECT u.email FROM reservation r INNER JOIN user u ON r.user_id = u.user_id WHERE r.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT r.reservation_id, r.user_id, r.court_id, r.reservation_start, r.reservation_end, c.facility_id FROM reservation r JOIN court c ON r.court_id = c.court_id WHERE DATE(r.reservation_start) = DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY);
